verses.text: In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* was \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* unto \w death|strong="H4191"\w*. And the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amoz|strong="H0531"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Set thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w order|strong="H6680"\w*; for thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and not \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.\f + \fr 20.1 \ft Set…: Heb. Give charge concerning thine house\f*

Then he \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

I \w beseech|strong="H0577"\w* thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* now how I have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* and with a \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*. And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w sore|strong="H1419"\w*.\f + \fr 20.3 \ft sore: Heb. with a great weeping\f*

And it came to pass, afore \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* was gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 20.4 \ft court: or, city\f*

Turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* the \w captain|strong="H5057"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*: behold, I will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* thee: on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And I will \w add|strong="H3254"\w* unto thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*; and I will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee and this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*; and I will \w defend|strong="H1598"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* for mine own sake, and for my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* sake.

And \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w lump|strong="H1690"\w* of \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*. And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* on the \w boil|strong="H7822"\w*, and he \w recovered|strong="H2421"\w*.

¶ And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, What \add shall be\add* the \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* me, and that I shall go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?

And \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* shalt thou have of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that he hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*: shall the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* go \w forward|strong="H1980"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w degrees|strong="H4609"\w*, or go \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w degrees|strong="H4609"\w*?

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, It is a light \w thing|strong="H7043"\w* for the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* to go \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w degrees|strong="H4609"\w*: nay, but let the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w backward|strong="H0322"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w degrees|strong="H4609"\w*.

And \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and he \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w degrees|strong="H4609"\w* \w backward|strong="H0322"\w*, \w by|strong="H4609"\w* which it had gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* in the \w dial|strong="H4609"\w* of \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*.\f + \fr 20.11 \ft dial: Heb. degrees\f*

¶ At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Berodach-baladan|strong="H1255"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Baladan|strong="H1081"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* and a \w present|strong="H4503"\w* unto \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*: for he had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* had been \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*.\f + \fr 20.12 \ft Berodach-baladan: or, Merodach-baladan\f*

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto them, and \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his precious \w things|strong="H5238"\w*, the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and the \w spices|strong="H1314"\w*, and the \w precious|strong="H2896"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*, and \add all\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w armour|strong="H3627"\w*, and all that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in his \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*: there was \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, nor in all his \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w*, that \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them not.\f + \fr 20.13 \ft precious things: or, spicery\f*\f + \fr 20.13 \ft armour: or, jewels: Heb. vessels\f*

¶ Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, What \w said|strong="H0559"\w* these \w men|strong="H0582"\w*? and from \w whence|strong="H0370"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* they unto thee? And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, They are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from a \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \add even\add* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What have they \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*? And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, All \add the things\add* that \add are\add* in mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* have they \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*: there is \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* among my \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* that I have not \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* them.
And \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, that all that \add is\add* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and that which thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have laid up in \w store|strong="H0686"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, shall be \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* into \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* shall be \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And of thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* that shall \w issue|strong="H3318"\w* from thee, which thou shalt \w beget|strong="H3205"\w*, shall they take \w away|strong="H3947"\w*; and they shall be \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* in the \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* unto \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, \w Good|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is it\add* not \add good\add*, if \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* be in my \w days|strong="H3117"\w*?\f + \fr 20.19 \ft Is it…: or, Shall there not be peace and truth, etc\f*

¶ And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, and all his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, and how he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w pool|strong="H1295"\w*, and a \w conduit|strong="H8585"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

And \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.
